entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • User Secrets not loading Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting 6.0 #63246
  • Two root revocation tests failing on Windows #63245
  • ExecutionEngineException when using Marshal.Copy #63244
  • Add diagnostic option to apphost itself. #63242
  • crossgen2 --instruction-set has no apparent effect on .NET 6 class library #63241
  • Question - Blazor AOT Build Time Optimization Flags #63238
  • Managed HttpListener does not shut down socket properly before closing #63236
  • When an assembly load fails, include detailed error information in the exception #63233

Closed

  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException at System.Net.Security.SslStream.ProcessBlob #62109
    7.0.0
  • Linux only: The type initializer for 'System.Net.CookieContainer' threw an exception. #63228

PullRequests

Created

  • Add some diagnostics for EFS tests #63243
    area-System.IO
  • Check for CodeSizeZero error before any assumptions about code existing #63239
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • Fix translation of Ping error codes #63237
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

Merged

  • Improve SuperPMI error message for JIT asserts #63229
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring over ILCompiler.Compiler unit tests #63232
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • avoid ArgumentOutOfRangeException while processing invalid or incomplete TLS frame #63184
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Speed up crossgen2 by a couple percent #63234
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Switch to objwriter from the dotnet/llvm-project repo #63177
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Don't create multiple large files at the same time #63032
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, test enhancement, 6.0.x
  • Add ILLink.Shared project to Native AOT #63230
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1531140 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix LocalCertificateSelectionCallback on unix #63200
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • Fix stack overflow with X509Certificate FriendlyName #63179
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Explicit test for injecting scoped IServiceProvider into scoped and transient services (#63225) #63226
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix XXHash for stripe size #61923
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] Fix setting timestamp on Windows on readonly files #62922
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.x
